references.reason: This paper is cited as foundational work in Open-Vocabulary Mobile Manipulation (OVMM), a problem that DynaMem directly addresses and improves upon.

references.paper_title: OK-Robot: What really matters in integrating open-knowledge models for robotics
references.reason: This paper is used as a strong baseline for comparison, highlighting the importance of dynamic memory in OVMM, which DynaMem aims to improve.

references.paper_title: Clip-Fields: Weakly supervised semantic fields for robotic memory
references.reason: This work is a direct predecessor to DynaMem, introducing concepts and methods for spatio-semantic memory which DynaMem builds upon and extends to dynamic environments.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: CLIP, the model from this paper, is a crucial component of DynaMem, providing a key element for its open-vocabulary object localization.
OWL-v2, the model from this paper, is used in DynaMem as an open-vocabulary object detector, playing a vital role in the object localization aspect.
